greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(2n) = a(n) + 2n - 1, a(2n+1) = 4n.
comment: Exponent of 2 in tangent numbers A000182.
Also, exponent of 2 in 4^(n-1)/n. [_David Brink_, Aug 08 2013]
link: Iain Fox, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: a[ n_] := If[ n < 1, 0, 2 n - 2 - IntegerExponent[n, 2]]; (* _Michael Somos_, Mar 02 2014 *)
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Dec 21 2004
